GmDescription:
A bright-blue liquid with a faint scent of liqorice. consuming it grants +1 Fortune Point. Additionally, while under its inï¬‚uence, when you spend a Fortune point, roll [[/r 1d100]]. If you roll a double, you regain a Fortune Point. When the effect wears off, lose all Fortune Points and gain 1 @Condition[Fatigued] condition that lasts for at least a day. 

Duration: [[/r 1d10]] minutes.
